description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Stockholm 2016
https://gotosthlm.com

Ian Massingham - Chief Evangelist for the EMEA region at Amazon Web Services

ABSTRACT
AWS Lambda is a compute service that runs your code in response to events and automatically manages the underlying compute resources for you. You can use AWS Lambda to extend other AWS [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:

title: AWS Lambda - Logic in the Cloud without Back-end
